snippet.title: Bad Piggies official gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
From the makers of Angry Birds, Bad Piggies will give you a chance to finally see the pig picture and take the role of the infamous green antagonists. http://badpiggies.com

Coming to app stores on September 27.

Like the Bad Piggies on Facebook: http://facebook.com/badpiggies
Follow the Bad Piggies on Twitter: http://twitter.com/badpiggies
